mapper.select:
select
from t_m_sim_base where 1=1 order by flow_use,id DESC limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(1) from t_m_sim_base t where
t.cal_day is null or t.cal_day < #{calDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_m_sim_base t where 1=1 and
t.cal_day is null or t.cal_day < #{calDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
limit 0,200
mapper.update: update t_m_sim_base set cal_day = #{calDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sim_id = #{simId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
